BitAbantu: Provides access to BitPlayer blocks for micro: bit functionality.
BitAbantu.KeyPressed: Get the key state (pressed or not)
BitAbantu.KeyPressed|param|key: the pin that acts as a button
BitAbantu.OnKey: Do立刻精神的 something when a key is pressed, releassed or clicked
BitAbantu.SetMotor: turn on of off the vibration motor
